const DataItem &  item

BOOLEAN AtlApplicationPlugin::OnKeyDown (  KeyCode  key_code  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if a key has been pressed and is still held. The code of the key is given by key_code.

BOOLEAN AtlApplicationPlugin::OnKeyUp (  KeyCode  key_code,
UINT32  duration
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if a key has been released. The code of the key is given by key_code.

void AtlApplicationPlugin::OnLanguageChanged (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if the language has been changed.

BOOLEAN AtlApplicationPlugin::OnLongKeyPress (  KeyCode  key_code  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if a key has been pressed and the duration exceeded the long-key-press limit. The code of the key is given by key_code.

BOOLEAN AtlApplicationPlugin::OnMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is invoked for any message the host application receives and does not dispatch itself

Implements Dispatcher.

Parameters:
item The feature-using plugin must set the context item

BOOLEAN AtlApplicationPlugin::OnVeryLongKeyPress (  KeyCode  key_code  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Is called, if a key has been pressed and the duration exceeded the very-long-key-press limit. The code of the key is given by key_code.

Parameters:
item The feature-providing plugin is able to update the state of the item.
